scripts.build: pnpm --filter @crop-copilot/contracts build && pnpm --filter @crop-copilot/domain build && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @crop-copilot/contracts build && pnpm --filter @crop-copilot/domain build && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @crop-copilot/contracts build && pnpm --filter @crop-copilot/domain build && tsx --test src/**/*.test.ts
